name: shared-moments
tagline: A private space for couples to share memories
description: SharedMoments is a self-hosted web app for couples to privately collect and relive photos, videos, and milestones. It supports galleries, timelines, countdowns, and shared lists in a romantic, tailored interface.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and organize photos in private albums for couples

features.title: Video Storage
features.description: Store and play video memories with secure, private access

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Record important dates, anniversaries, and relationship milestones

features.title: Shared Lists
features.description: Collaborate on to-do lists, wish lists, or planning checklists
